mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (mid, pid, quantity) VALUES (#{mid}, #{pid}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT id, cart.pid, product.cid, category.name cname, product.bid, brand.name bname, product.name, price, img_url imgUrl, quantity FROM cart, product, brand, category WHERE cart.pid = product.pid AND product.bid = brand.bid AND product.cid = category.cid AND mid = #{mid}
SELECT sum(cart.quantity) totalcount, sum(price * quantity) totalprice FROM cart, product WHERE cart.pid = product.pid AND mid = #{mid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE mid = #{mid} AND id = #{id}
